attributes.action: ask David Tennant to continue as the 10th Doctor
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
At this time of economic uncertainty and global climate chaos - we need more than ever the leadership, courage, inspiration, intelligence, energy, humour and enthusiasm which the 10th Doctor has shown in saving the World so many times over the last 3 years. 

Our confidence in David Tennant’s continuing role as the Doctor 
urges us to request the Prime Minister to intervene and ask that David reconsider his decision to step down. We need David to continue as the Doctor and illustrate that we can survive difficult times given the right leadership and
determination to make a positive difference for the sake of Planet Earth and our people.

With the Prime Minister’s involvement we are sure that a way forward can be found that will enable David to retain his vital role as the 10th Doctor whilst also taking on other commitments.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
